Protocols/MapViewDelegate.html#/c:objc(p.name: -mapViewDidCompleteLoading:
Protocols/MapViewDelegate.html#/c:objc(p.abstract: Called when Map is completed loading. It tell that view is complete to perform any operation like applying styles etc.

Protocols/MapViewDelegate.html#/c:objc(p.name: -mapView:didSingleTapAtCoordinate:
Protocols/MapViewDelegate.html#/c:objc(p.abstract: Called when tap on particular coordinate. Not get called when tap gets a Marker or POI

Protocols/MapViewDelegate.html#/c:objc(p.name: -mapView:didDoubleTapAtCoordinate:
Protocols/MapViewDelegate.html#/c:objc(p.abstract: Called when double tap gesture recognized on a particular coordinate on map.

Protocols/MapViewDelegate.html#/c:objc(p.name: -mapView:didLongPressAtCoordinate:
Protocols/MapViewDelegate.html#/c:objc(p.abstract: Called when long gesture recognized on a particular coordinate on map.

Protocols/MapViewDelegate.html#/c:objc(p.name: -mapView:userLocationUpdatedTo:
Protocols/MapViewDelegate.html#/c:objc(p.abstract: Called when user location is updated. It only gets called when showsUserLocation is set true

Protocols/MapViewDelegate.html#/c:objc(p.name: -mapView:didFailToUpdateUserLocationWithError:
Protocols/MapViewDelegate.html#/c:objc(p.abstract: Called when user location update failed. Reason can be extracted from error

Protocols/MapViewDelegate.html#/c:objc(p.name: -mapView:cameraPositionDidStartChange:
Protocols/MapViewDelegate.html#/c:objc(p.abstract: Called when camera position is start changing on map. It can be triggerd by setting camera position of map.

Protocols/MapViewDelegate.html#/c:objc(p.name: -mapView:cameraPositionDidChange:
Protocols/MapViewDelegate.html#/c:objc(p.abstract: Same as cameraPositionDidStartChange: but get called when camera position is changing

Protocols/MapViewDelegate.html#/c:objc(p.name: -mapView:cameraPositionDidEndChange:
Protocols/MapViewDelegate.html#/c:objc(p.abstract: Same as cameraPositionDidStartChange: but get called when any change camera position is complete and map is still now

Protocols/MapViewDelegate.html#/c:objc(p.name: -mapView:regionWillChangeAnimated:
Protocols/MapViewDelegate.html#/c:objc(p.abstract: Called immediately before the displayed map region moves.

Protocols/MapViewDelegate.html#/c:objc(p.name: -mapViewRegionIsChanging:
Protocols/MapViewDelegate.html#/c:objc(p.abstract: Called repeatedly when the displayed map region is moving due to an animation or a gesture.

Protocols/MapViewDelegate.html#/c:objc(p.name: -mapView:regionDidChangeAnimated:
Protocols/MapViewDelegate.html#/c:objc(p.abstract: Called after the displayed map region moves.

Enums/RouteType.html#/c:@E@RouteType@ROU.name: ROUTE_TYPE_FASTEST
Enums/RouteType.html#/c:@E@RouteType@ROU.abstract: The fastest route to your destination based on speed and traffic condition.

Enums/RouteType.html#/c:@E@RouteType@ROU.name: ROUTE_TYPE_SHORTEST
Enums/RouteType.html#/c:@E@RouteType@ROU.abstract: The shortest route to your destination based on distance.

Enums/RouteType.html#/c:@E@RouteType@ROU.name: ROUTE_TYPE_UNDETERMINED
Enums/RouteType.html#/c:@E@RouteType@ROU.abstract: The fastest route to your destination based on speed.

Enums/RouteType.html.name: RouteType
Enums/RouteType.html.abstract: Enum provide RouteType type ROUTE_TYPE_FASTEST ,ROUTE_TYPE_SHORTEST or ROUTE_TYPE_UNDETERMINED.

Enums/MapViewMode.html.name: MapViewMode
Enums/MapViewMode.html.abstract: Enum provide MapView Mode Standard or Night.

Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.name: cameraPosition

Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.name: allGesturesEnabled
Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.abstract: Sets the preference for whether all gestures should be enabled (default) or

Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.name: zoomEnabled
Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.abstract: Wether zoom gesture is enabled or disabled on map .

Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.name: scrollEnabled
Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.abstract: Wether pan gesture is enabled or disabled on map.

Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.name: tiltEnabled
Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.abstract: Wether tilt gesture is enabled or disabled on map.

Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.name: rotateEnabled
Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.abstract: Wether rotate gesture is enabled or disabled on map.

Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.name: showsUserLocation
Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.abstract: Set to YES to add the user location annotation to the map and start updating its location

Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.name: myCurrentLocation
Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.abstract: If My Location is enabled, reveals where the user location dot is being

Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.name: -pointForCoordinate:
Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.abstract: Convert a longitude and latitude to a view position.

Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.name: -coordinateForPoint:
Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.abstract: Convert a position in view coordinates into the longitude and latitude of the corresponding geographic location.

Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.name: -animateToLocation:
Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.abstract: Changes the postion of map. Map will be centered to new position.

Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.name: -animateToLocation:withDuration:
Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.abstract: To animate the location movement with user define duration

Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.name: -animateToZoom:
Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.abstract: Changes zoom of the map. If value of zoom is out of zoom bounds (minzoom, maxzoom) zoom will be set to either minzoom or maxzoom

Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.name: -animateToZoom:withDuration:
Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.abstract: To animate the zoom movement with user define duration

Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.name: -animateToRotation:
Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.abstract: Changes the rotation of map from true north. Zero indicates true north.

Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.name: -animateToRotation:withDuration:
Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.abstract: To animate the rotation movement with user define duration

Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.name: -animateToTilt:
Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.abstract: Changes the tilt of map. 0 means looking straight down at map.

Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.name: -animateToTilt:withDuration:
Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.abstract: To animate the tilt movement with user define duration

Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.name: -setBounds:withPadding:

Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.abstract: Same as setBounds:withPadding: but with animation over specified duration

Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.name: -setBoundsFitInRectAnimated:rect:withPadding:duration:
Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.abstract: Same as setBounds:rect:withPadding: but with animation over specified duration

Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.abstract: Enum provide MapView Mode Standard or Night.

Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.abstract: A Boolean indicating whether the map displays point-of-interest information.

Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.name: showsBuildings
Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.abstract: A Boolean indicating whether the map displays extruded building information.

Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.abstract: A Boolean indicating whether the map displays a location button control.

Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.name: showsCompass
Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.abstract: A Boolean indicating whether the map displays a compass control.

Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.name: zoomControlsEnabled

Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.name: trafficEnabled

Classes/TPLMapView.html#/c:objc(cs)TPLMa.name: minimumZoom
